alert.note: Alert for Vernon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 31 at 6:35AM CDT until April 02 at 9:25AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Springfield MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri... Little Osage River near Horton affecting Vernon County. For the Little Osage River Basin...including Horton, Fulton...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Osage River near Horton. * WHEN...From this morning to late Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 41.0 feet, minor flooding affects low lying areas near the gage site and farmland along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 40.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 41.7 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 41.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 645 AM CDT.
